snippet.title: [UQAT] Against Light
snippet.description:
After being expelled from the city by its leaders, helped by his shadowy friends, the shaman uses his powers to take them down one by one.

Game available on itch.io:
https://alexquevillon.itch.io/againstlight

Add me on LinkedIn :)
https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexquevillon/


Against Light is a simple game made in less than two months by 35 UQAT* students plus 6 awesome music composers.

* UQAT: Université du Québec en Abitibi-Témiscamingue, Montréal


Development Team
Original Idea
 Léa-Marie Munger
